DataElement.preferredName: Cell Selected Modified And/Or Engineered Infusion Procedure Product Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the cells in the infused product were selected, modified and or engineered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cell Selected Modified And/Or Engineered Infusion Procedure Product
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid._Select from a group._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The application of genetic-based biotechnology to modify the characteristics of an organism by cutting, splicing, and transferring genetic materials, especially DNA, from one or more species of organism._A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Cell Choose Change And/Or Genetic Engineering Infusion Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid.:Select from a group.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:The application of genetic-based biotechnology to modify the characteristics of an organism by cutting, splicing, and transferring genetic materials, especially DNA, from one or more species of organism.:A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream.

Concepts.definition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.

The application of genetic-based biotechnology to modify the characteristics of an organism by cutting, splicing, and transferring genetic materials, especially DNA, from one or more species of organism.
Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.

Property.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
